name: Plantations Wars
description:
You are George a monkey that just moved to a village in the middle of nowhere. You are employed in a plantation and on your first day of work you stumble into a feud about  plot of land that has been going on for years.

 Will you help one of the parties?

 Will you run?

 Will you fail?

Only you can answer that question!

This game has sounds! :D
